discussion.content: B. Inline Panel - test it and see in your splunk instance. You can save as a dashboard panel and then convert from a inline panel to a pre-built panel.

questions.question_text: When saving a search directly to a dashboard panel instead of saving as a report first, which of the following is created?
Which of the following statements describes a search job?

discussion.content: See page 69 of the Splunk 7.x Fundamentals Part 1 PDF

choices.C: A search job can only be stopped when less than 50% of events are returned
choices.B: A search job can only be paused when less than 50% of events are returned
choices.A: Once a search job begins, it cannot be stopped
choices.D: Once a search job begins, it can be stopped or paused at any point in time
